actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with amendments. With written report No. 101-418.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 770.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for increases in appropriation ceilings for land acquisition and development in certain units of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to increase the authorization of appropriations for land acquisition in: (1) Channel Islands National Park, California; (2) Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park, Maryland and the District of Columbia; and (3) Cumberland Island National Seashore, Georgia. Amends Federal law to increase the authorization of appropriations for land development in: (1) Cuyahoga Valley National Recreation Area, Ohio; and (2) Kalaupapa National Historical Park, Hawaii.

titles.title: A bill to provide for increases in appropriation ceilings for land acquisition and development in certain units of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
